column4: I would like to setup an Ubuntu server 8.04 with two eth ports to act as a dhcp and router (NAT), the problem is that most tutorials are targeted for those with a graphic gui (either firestarter or webmin) and i need something that is more commandline.
http://qtables.radom.org/  (seems its not being actively developed any longer)
it's basically just a .sh script that sets up your iptables
